about.description: This project provides an object-oriented software package for dynamic flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations using implementations of the direct method or Algorithm 1 described in the paper Harwood et al., 2016. The main algorithms for solving embedded LP problems are written in C++ and use the GNU Linear Programming Kit (GLPK) and the Suite of Nonlinear and Differential/Algebraic Equation Solvers (SUNDIALS) CVODE or IDA. Extension modules to cobrapy are provided for easy generation and simulation of DFBA models.
about.summary: Object-oriented software for dynamic flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations.

name: dfba

about.description: This project provides an object-oriented software package for dynamic flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations using implementations of the direct method or Algorithm 1 described in the paper Harwood et al., 2016. The main algorithms for solving embedded LP problems are written in C++ and use the GNU Linear Programming Kit (GLPK) and the Suite of Nonlinear and Differential/Algebraic Equation Solvers (SUNDIALS) CVODE or IDA. Extension modules to cobrapy are provided for easy generation and simulation of DFBA models.
about.summary: Object-oriented software for dynamic flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dfba" %}
{% set version = "0.1.8" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: fdeeecab9bfe169c091382195eab32d49545a140e14741d446b4c164a62ec24a

build:
  skip: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps

requirements:
  build:
    - cmake
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - glpk
    - pybind11
    - python
    - sundials
    - pip
  run:
    - cobra
    - depinfo
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - glpk
    - optlang
    - pandas
    - pybind11
    - python
    - python-symengine
    - sundials
    - sympy

test:
  imports:
    - dfba
  files:
    - iJR904.xml.gz

about:
  home: https://dynamic-fba.readthedocs.io
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: "Object-oriented software for dynamic flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations."
  description: >
    This project provides an object-oriented software package for dynamic
    flux-balance analysis (DFBA) simulations using implementations of the direct
    method or Algorithm 1 described in the paper Harwood et al., 2016. The main
    algorithms for solving embedded LP problems are written in C++ and use the
    GNU Linear Programming Kit (GLPK) and the Suite of Nonlinear and
    Differential/Algebraic Equation Solvers (SUNDIALS) CVODE or IDA. Extension
    modules to cobrapy are provided for easy generation and simulation of DFBA
    models.
  doc_url: https://dynamic-fba.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/davidtourigny/dynamic-fba

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Midnighter
    - davidtourigny
